alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:37PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Plumas and east central Shasta Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 337 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster strong thunderstorms 8 miles southeast of Cassel, or 21 miles south of Dana, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson Park, Old Station and Burney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
